games.question: A grand pendulum swings endlessly. Its plaque reads: "What runs all around a backyard, yet never moves?"
games.hint: It goes around the perimeter of the yard.

Behind a gear-shaped window a riddle glows: "I have a neck but no head, two arms but no hands. What am I?"
A music box plays backward. Etched inside: "Forward I am heavy, backward I am not." What word am I?
